backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining all data types for admin users, vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blogs, media, interactions, and stats, including authorization and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module containing old and new actor state structures and logic for upgrading stored data across versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing UI components, pages, hooks, and admin CMS features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Entry HTML file loading the root React app with favicon and main script.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to rebuild, redeploy, and validate the frontend canister including route checks and common issues.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by enforcing authentication unless emergency bypass is enabled.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard layout with navigation, sidebar, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage, migration, cookies, token retrieval, and bypass session creation.
Enables or disables a debug-only admin authentication bypass with preset user data.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied screen with a redirect button to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Provides a standardized header component with title, subtitle, and optional actions for admin pages.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts and managing comments, including image selection and metadata.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for destructive delete actions with optional loading state.
Generic CRUD table component with search, column rendering, optional publish status, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media management panel providing search, preview, and deletion of media assets with error and auth handling.
Media selection dialog that loads, filters, and displays media assets and returns the chosen URL.
Button for uploading media files that converts a file to a data URL and creates a new media asset.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog form for creating or editing promotions with fields for text, dates, image selection, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog form for adding or editing testimonials, capturing customer info, review details, rating, image, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Complex vehicle form dialog supporting basic info, media, specs, variants, and commercial features with save handling.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Editor with checkboxes to toggle commercial vehicle feature flags.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Form for editing technical specifications and managing additional feature list items.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: UI for adding, editing, and deleting vehicle variants and their features.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin CMS data using the actor API.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Deprecated empty module kept only for compatibility.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state, including emergency bypass, session validation, and login handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Provides a debug interface to manually test admin login requests and view token/role results.
Renders the main admin login form with session handling, redirects, and emergency bypass behavior.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Displays and edits the admin user's profile using CMS queries, with form state and save handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Manages CRUD operations for blog posts with search, dialogs, and error handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Shows summary statistics for CMS entities like vehicles, promotions, testimonials, and blog posts.
Displays and manages contact form submissions and credit simulations with search and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Provides UI to upload media and configure homepage banners using a media picker.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Lists, searches, creates, edits, and deletes promotional entries using a CRUD table and form dialog.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Manages customer testimonials with search, create, edit, and delete capabilities.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin page for filtering, creating, editing, and deleting vehicles, separated by passenger or commercial category.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays admin visitor statistics using fetched data and renders stat cards and explanatory info.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines the admin panel theme, layout, color tokens, and component styling rules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main router configuration for public and admin routes using TanStack Router and layout components.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Renders a comment form with validation, reset behavior, and support for replying to specific comments.
Displays nested blog comments with reply support and renders reply forms inline.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Shows like, share, and comment actions for a blog post, tracking likes via localStorage.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form pengiriman kontak dengan validasi dasar yang memanggil API submit contact dan mereset state setelah sukses.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form permintaan simulasi kredit yang mengumpulkan data pengguna dan mengirimnya melalui API sebelum mereset state.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Provides a global React error boundary that shows a fallback UI and reload button on errors.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer dengan informasi dealer, kontak, media sosial, jam operasional, dan statistik pengunjung.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Layout publik yang merender navbar, hero optional, konten utama, CTA bawah, footer, dan bar CTA bawah.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bar CTA mobile dengan tombol telepon, WhatsApp, kredit, dan menu popover, termasuk form simulasi kredit dalam sheet.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Sheet menu navigasi bawah berisi daftar tautan halaman utama dan ditutup saat item dipilih.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Navbar responsif dengan menu desktop, sheet mobile, dan tombol WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: Komponen judul section dengan ikon dan teks terpusat.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Section CTA dengan ajakan menghubungi via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner sederhana dengan judul selamat datang dan subjudul.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Card component showing vehicle image, details, price, badges, and links to detail or consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating vehicles, blog data, promotions, testimonials, and other backend resources.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors, page views, and periodic presence updates using actor-backed mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining color system, theming, and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with likes, shares, comments, and interaction handling.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Lists all blog posts with images, excerpts, and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle including variants, features, pricing, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Displays categorized commercial vehicles (light, medium, tractor head) with filtering and listing.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form, business contact details, map embed, and consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing banners, featured vehicles, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a selected passenger vehicle, including variants, pricing, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published non-commercial passenger vehicles using VehicleCard components.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Fetches and displays active promotions with images, descriptions, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows customer testimonials with ratings, images, and reviews.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin routes for post-deployment smoke testing and provides validation utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural constraints, known issues, and required fixes for an automotive website with stable persistence, backend/frontend separation, and an admin CMS. Includes notes on routing, authentication, media storage, and current bugs affecting frontend rendering and admin login.
